Package com.scheduler.client.controller

Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
com.scheduler.client.controller.HomeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class HomeController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the Home screen. The view file that this class controls is Home.fxml.
Author:
Dillon Christensen

    • tabChangeListener

      private final javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<javafx.scene.control.Tab> tabChangeListener
      Listener for Tab change. The newly selected Tab is stored statically to be reopened, if navigated away and back to Home.

    • appRadioListener

      private final javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<javafx.scene.control.Toggle> appRadioListener
      Listener for toggling radio buttons. When toggled, the Appointment table is filtered according to AppointmentTimeSpan.

      public HomeController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Called to initialize a controller after its root element has been completely processed. Initializes class members, sets up event handlers for buttons and dropdowns, binds and formats table cells, and sets up report generation and tab functionality.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • handleReportBtn

      private void handleReportBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles button to generate reports. Depends on value from reportChoiceBox to generate the correct report. Lambda Justification 1: Lambdas are used here for switch statement syntax. This syntax simplifies the statements, making them more human-readable and eliminates the need for break statements.
      Parameters:
      event - button click event

    • popUpAny15MinuteUpcomingAppointments

      private void popUpAny15MinuteUpcomingAppointments()
      Pops up a prompt for any upcoming appointments, within the next 15 minutes. Only triggers on login.

    • handleCustomerCountryCB

      public void handleCustomerCountryCB(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handler for the Country ChoiceBox on the "Customer" application tab. Filters the "customers" table by country or shows all customers, based on the selection.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent that triggered method

    • handleCustomerDeleteBtn

      public void handleCustomerDeleteBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handler for the Delete Button on the "Customers" application tab. Deletes any of the customer's appointments before deleting the customer, due to foreign key constraints. Warns before deletion. If any of the associated appointments were not successfully deleted, the customer deletion is aborted.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent that triggered method

    • handleAppointmentDeleteBtn

      public void handleAppointmentDeleteBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

    • handleCustomerModifyBtn

      public void handleCustomerModifyBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles 'Modify' button on the 'Customers' tab. Opens form to modify the currently selected customer. If no customer is selected, a NoCustomerSelectedException is thrown, and caught with an error message displayed in the UI.
      Parameters:
      event - button click event

    • handleAppointmentModifyBtn

      public void handleAppointmentModifyBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles 'Modify' button on the 'Appointments' tab. Opens form to modify the currently selected appointment. If no appointment is selected, a NoAppointmentSelectedException is thrown, and caught with an error message displayed in the UI.
      Parameters:
      event - button click event

    • openSelectedTab

      private void openSelectedTab()
      Opens selected tab. Tab is remembered, i.e. when navigating to a different screen, the last tab opened is opened again when returning to the Home Screen.

    • formatForZDTCell

      private javafx.scene.control.TableCell<Appointment,ZonedDateTime> formatForZDTCell()
      Formats cell to display a ZonedDateTime in a more human-readable form. Formatter is used to generate the formatted string.
      Returns:
      formatted TableCell
